Class Dealer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Dealer

  • public class Dealer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to use as a static dealer. The dealer can perform operations for Rental, Person, and Vehicle.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matt Mackenzie & James Macak

    • Constructor Detail

      • Dealer

        public Dealer()
        Constructor to create a new Dealer. The Dealer houses 6 array lists, vehicles, customers, privileged customers, basic customers, all company IDs in use, and all customer IDs in use.

      • createBasicCustomer

        public static Customer createBasicCustomer(java.lang.String firstName,
                                           java.lang.String lastName,
                                           java.lang.String dateOfBirth,
                                           java.lang.String socialSecurityNumber,
                                           java.lang.String gender,
                                           java.lang.String address)
        Create a new basic customer. See parameter description in customer class. Age is calculated based on the date of birth, and the customer is given a random ID.
        Parameters:
        firstName -
        lastName -
        dateOfBirth -
        socialSecurityNumber -
        gender -
        address -
        Returns:
        The new cutomer.

      • addSale

        public static void addSale(double sale)
        Add a sale to the total sales.
        Parameters:
        sale - The amount to add.

      • calculateSale

        public static java.lang.String[] calculateSale(Rental contract)
        Calculate a sale. $200 fine for damage. $50 fine for more than 100 miles. $20 fine for not filling up the tank.
        Parameters:
        contract - The finished contract to calculate the days since rented.
        Returns:
        A string of the price formated "%.2f"

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                            throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The found customer.
        Throws:
